header.rec_loc: ANON & ANON's home in East London
header.topics: Passover Seder, Judaism, Jewish food, Italy, travel plans, films, Hebrew, recipes, kosher food, Paris, restaurants, Ortolan, family, names, cooking, baking, New York,
header.activity: Friends and family chatting over Passover dinner at home
header.conv_type: discussing, explaining, inquiring, announcing, anecdote telling, telling jokes
